faction_ability.name: Heavenly Father Guide Us
faction_ability.description: This character replenishes 2 Will Points and every other friendly character within 3" replenishes 1 Will Point .

unique.name: Patriarch Bishop
unique.description: All friendly characters with the Faction (The Vatican) keyword gain Companion ( Leader ) while in line of sight of this character.

command.name: He Will Strengthen You
command.description: Until the end of the round, any friendly characters within 3" gain Universal Shielding (3) .

cards.name: Father Cesta
keywords: Discipline ( Runes of Sovereignty, Wild Magic )

unique.name: Masterful Summoning
unique.description: Friendly characters with the Construct keyword lose Mindless for the rest of the game, even if this character is killed.

command.name: Gates of Heaven
command.description: Until the end of the round, whenever a friendly character with the Construct keyword in line of sight within 6" uses a Will Point to increase a roll, it instead counts as 2 Will Points . Impart Will At the start of the game, all friendly characters with the Construct keyword increase their starting Will Points by 1.

unique.name: Exorcism
unique.description: When making a Combat action with Divine Touch, if it causes at least 1 Damage , the target loses 1 Will Point . If the target has 0 Will Points remaining, the attack instead does +3 Damage .

command.name: Fear (-2)Fear the Lord
command.description: Pick 1 enemy character within 6". Until the end of the round, whenever that character is hit by a Combat action, the attacker gains Fear (-2) . Helm of Penitence This character may attempt to Dispel magic spells as if it has Mage (3) . In addition, enemy characters may not use Will Points when within 3” of this character.

cards.name: Inquisitor
keywords: Discipline ( Blood Rites , Runes of Sovereignty , Wild Magic )

unique.name: Stigmata
unique.description: If this character uses one or more Life Points as Will Points (due to Frenzied ) either to increase the dice pool or to perform an action (like casting spells), it may re-roll an equal number of dice (including the Destiny Dice ) during that action. If it does this on a Combat action, Hands of God instead has Penetration -3 for that action.

command.name: For the Glory of God
command.description: Until the end of the round, any friendly characters within 3" gain Expert Offence (2) .

unique.name: Destined For Victory
unique.description: All friendly characters with the Hospitaller keyword may choose to re-roll the Destiny Dice when making re-rolls as long as this character is on the board.

unique.name: Full Plate
unique.description: If this character ever enters water, it receives a Stunned counter which is only removed if it ends its turn out of water.

command.name: Fight Until the Last
command.description: This Command Ability is used out of sequence, at the start of the round before rolling initiative. Pick 1 friendly character in line of sight within 6". If that character is reduced to 0 Life Points before they take their turn, they are not removed from the board. Instead they are only removed after their turn is complete.

unique.name: Heavenly Vision
unique.description: Whenever a friendly character in line of sight within 6" is instructed to replenish Will Points , increase the amount replenished by 1.

unique.name: Renewed Vigour
unique.description: When this character kills an enemy character, he replenishes his full Will Points .

command.name: Put it Through the Heart!
command.description: Pick a friendly character in line of sight within 12". One of that character's weapons gains -4 Penetration until the end of the round.

unique.name: Full Plate
unique.description: If this character ever enters water, it receives a Stunned counter which is only removed if it ends its turn out of water.

cards.name: Conventual Chaplain
keywords: HospitallerPsychic Communion Whenever this character or any other character with line of sight to this character uses the ORDER or COUNTER Commands, they ignore any other restrictions about line of sight.

unique.name: Righteous Zeal
unique.description: Every friendly character gains Brave while in line of sight of this character.

command.name: Look With Satisfaction Upon
command.description: Until the end of the round, any friendly characters within 3" gain Parry (2) .

unique.name: Full Plate
unique.description: If this character event enters water, it reveives a Stunned counter which is only removed if it ends its turn out of water.

command.name: Hasten Your Steps, The Unfaithful
command.description: All other friendly characters within 3" gain +1 MOVEMENT until the end of the round.

command.name: Come Let Us Make Bricks
command.description: Remove 1 friendly character with the Construct keyword from the board. Place it within 3" of this character (with no changes to its Life Points ).

unique.name: Full Plate
unique.description: If this character ever enters water, it receives a Stunned counter which is only removed if it ends its turn out of water.

unique.name: Censer Bearer
unique.description: Any friendly character that starts its turn within 6" and in line of sight of this character replenishes 1 Will Point . Characters with the Censer Bearer rule cannot be affected by this rule (from their own or other Censer Bearers). Characters cannot be affected by multiple instances of this rule in one turn.

unique.name: Infernal Ally
unique.description: While this character is on solid ground, enemy characters that end their turn in base contact with this character lose 1 Life Point .
